title: Tether and HoneyCoin Collaborate to Expand Stablecoin Access Across Africa
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital asset industry, and HoneyCoin, one of the fastest-growing African fintech platforms on a mission to build the operating system for money movement in frontier markets, are announcing a strategic collaboration aimed at accelerating access to digital assets across Africa.
